seo.title: Freight Audit & Analytics Company | Orca Intelligence Inc
seo.description: Get full supply chain visibility and be more profitable. Modern freight audit, data cleansing, and reporting to cut costs and speed decisions.

hero.title: Freight Audit & Analytics
hero.subtitle: Get full supply chain visibility and be more profitable.

positioning: Orca Freight Audit & Analytics is a modern-day freight audit organization offering best-in-market freight audit, data cleansing, and analytical reporting for the lowest prices in the industry. Our integrated supply chain technology helps create efficiencies and reduce costs, empowering better, faster decisions.
whyDifferent: Technology and process drive an efficient supply chain. We provide first-class technology and tailor our processes to your needs—minimal change to your operation, maximum insight. We don’t force you into our box; we fit your organization.
benefits: One standard invoice for all vendors
Full audit trail on every invoice

audit: Automate manual audit steps: data collection, invoice review, reporting
Verify base rates, discounts, and accessorials
Ensure tax compliance; correct fees and tariffs
Confirm final amount for accuracy before payment
analytics: Holistic network view: scorecards, cost-to-sell, GL analysis, budget tracking
Custom analysis; interactive reports and dashboards
Mobile access to supply chain data, anytime
